resources.string: Le Jardin Lecoq is very spacious with many paths that lead to a lake, pond and garden. Much of this park is covered in grass. It is located near the college and provides free Wi-Fi.
The park is quite the hike, but at the end of it there is a beautiful scenery that onlooks the city of Clermont-Ferrand.
A small park known for its asymmetrical statues, running water along the grass and the Poly-Dome.
